categories: Category:Starships of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: The Javelin was an Harrower-class dreadnought active during the Galactic War. The Sith Empire used it during the Battle of Corellia in an attempt to destroy the Rift Alliance Coalition Forces by setting a trap. Acting as if escorting troop carriers to Corellia, the ship was in fact planned to self-destruct after being boarded by the Barsen'thor and the Rift Alliance. However, the Jedi and its allies managed to capture the ship instead.
